mean_cn: n.国会；代表大会；议会；立法机关
mean_en: (in the US and some other countries) the name of the group of people who are elected to make laws, in the US consisting of the Senate and the House of Representatives
sentence: A congress is a large meeting that is held to discuss national policies.
sentence_trans: 国会是讨论国家大事的大型会议。
word_etyma: con共同 + gress行走 → 走到一起 → congress代表大会
